revised_title: Faraday's Discovery of Electromagnetic Rotation of Light
tldr: Michael Faraday discovered that a polarized light ray can be rotated when it passes through a diamagnetic material placed in a magnetic field. This phenomenon, now known as the Faraday effect, demonstrates a connection between electricity, magnetism, and light. Faraday's experiments also showed that the rotation direction depends on the direction of the magnetic field and the polarization of the light ray.
